zh.templateTips: 外部导入的内容不受Blive控制, 无法支持特定模块,甚至引起排版问题。

updateBtn.fileSpan: 你可从本地导入简介到blive中

en.templateTips: Externally imported content is not controlled by Blive, cannot support specific modules, and even causes typesetting problems.

updateBtn.urlSpan: Get the introduction of the live room remotely
updateBtn.fileSpan: You can import profile from local to blive
